synonyms.synonym: Succinate-ubiquinone oxidoreductase cytochrome b small subunit

protein.specific_function: Membrane-anchoring subunit of succinate dehydrogenase (SDH) that is involved in complex II of the mitochondrial electron transport chain and is responsible for transferring electrons from succinate to ubiquinone (coenzyme Q) (By similarity).

go_class.description: mitochondrial electron transport, succinate to ubiquinone

protein_properties.protein_sequence: >Succinate dehydrogenase [ubiquinone] cytochrome b small subunit, mitochondrial MAVLWRLSAVCGALGGRALLLRTPVVRPAHISAFLQDRPIPEWCGVQHIHLSPSHHSGSK AASLHWTSERVVSVLLLGLLPAAYLNPCSAMDYSLAAALTLHGHWGLGQVVTDYVHGDAL QKAAKAGLLALSALTFAGLCYFNYHDVGICKAVAMLWKL
